feed.title: Sault Ste. Marie - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Sault Ste. Marie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:05 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 02:18 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -4.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -4.9°C
Wind: ESE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy becoming mixed with periods of ice pellets before morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of snow or ice pellets. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers beginning near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. High plus 4. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
